channel.title: Computacion Visual 2022-2 RGB
channel.description: Recent content on Computacion Visual 2022-2 RGB

item.description: Tallere 2 : Visual Illusions # Problem statement # Identify, implement, and discuss possible applications of some known optical illussions on the design and development of computer graphics. Máscaras de convolución # Explicación visual : # In mathematics (in particular, functional analysis), convolution is a mathematical operation on two functions (f and g) that produces a third function (f * g) that expresses how the shape of one is modified by the other.
